home.registration: Registration for Summer 2021 classes begins June 31, 2021!
home.parentBrowse: Browse through programs below and then select a class with the date and time of your choice! We make sure that 100% of our participants’ demonstrated needs are met.
home.volunteerBrowse: Volunteering with SDC is simple and easy! Get started with volunteering with SDC by creating an account to volunteer and then selecting the program you want to volunteer for.
home.emptyPrograms: There are currently no programs available to register for. Come back shortly to see the programs we have to offer for the next term!

program.notEligible: Your child is not eligible for this age group. Please select a different class.
program.waitlistNotify: We'll notify you once space becomes available
program.emptyProgram: There are currently no available classes for {{program}}. Register for a waitlisted class below or check out another program

class.waitlistedInfo: An email will be sent to you when a spot opens
class.emptyWaitlist: Currently you are not waitlisted in any classes. Any classes you waitlist for will show up here!
class.emptyClass: Currently you have not registered in any classes. Any classes you registered for will show up here!

account.poi_approved: Your income statement has been approved. You might be eligible for discounts, please be on the look out for coupon from us.
account.poi_pending: Your income statement is under review.
account.bgc_approved: Your criminal record check has been approved.
account.bgc_pending: Your criminal record check is under review.

signIn.firstTime: First time? We’ll email you a magic code to sign up instantly.
